summary: New quest, new location, new weapon and new companion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img width=667,height=141]http://i.imgur.com/1y2Hzgj.png[/img][/center]

[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/GlBgwIU.png[/img][/center]
[size=4]Meet in the "Nightgate Inn" tavern the old man Alov, who, if you buy him a beer, tell a short story that may evolve into a new little adventure with a reward at the end. Prepare yourself as it should - the adventure will not be easy.

[/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/uKTpPLv.png[/img][/center][list]
[center][*][size=3]New quest, new location, new weapon and new companion;[/size]
[*][size=3]Voice acting - in Russian; Texts - in English;[/size]
[*][size=3]Receiving the coveted two-handed sword, You will find that it has no scabbard (You took it out of stone!). To make a scabbard for weapons and get a one-handed version, you can forge it in the smithy, in the 'steel' section;[/size]
[*][size=3]New companion has a unique class that focused on melee, a unique model of body based on UNP, unique equipment and a unique combat ability - he can teleport to the enemy, attacking him from a distance, even if it is in unattainable hills or in shelters;[/size]
[*][size=3]Despite apparent evidence - the sword from the addon is not an '[i]Excalibur[/i]', but, as the whole addon, it has references to the two different artworks, so please do not write comments about this theme;[/size]
[*][size=3]A magical wave from the power strikes of the sword disorients the opponents and inflicts damage to them, depending on the level of the player and the type of sword - for a two-handed weapon, damage, as wellas the consumption of magical energy for strikes, is greater.[/size]
[/center][/list]
[size=3]
[/size][center][size=4][size=3][u][i]Note: if Alov does not speak to you, do save/load and talk with him.[/i][/u][/size]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1077816003]Steam Workshop[/url]          [url=http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/kvesty/mech_v_kamne_the_sword_in_the_stone/250-1-0-22763]ModGames[/url][/size][/center][center][/center][img width=900,height=222]http://i.imgur.com/Hl9nrbg.gif[/img]
